00044    // Template function definition
00045 
00046    template <int N>
00047    void PointGroup::makeStar(const IntVector& root, FSArray<IntVector, N>& star)
00048    {
00049       // Precondition
00050       if (star.capacity() < size()) {
00051          UTIL_THROW("Star array capacity is less than order of group");
00052       }
00053 
00054       IntVector vector;
00055       int       i, j;
00056       bool      found;
00057       star.clear();
00058       for (i = 0; i < size(); ++i) {
00059          vector = root*(*this)[i];
00060          found = false;
00061          for (j = 0; j < star.size(); ++j) {
00062             if (vector == star[j]) {
00063                found = true;
00064                break;
00065             }
00066          }
00067          if (!found) {
00068             star.append(vector);
00069          }
00070       }
00071    
00072    }
00073 
00074 }
00075 #endif
